channel.title: Another noob question. sorry
channel.description: I searched it but i couldn't find it. Can someone tell me or give me a link on how to make ancients freeze?

item.title: Another noob question. sorry
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

Ok, first off search your client.java for Ice barrage, there should be a couple, but when you get to the very last one, under -

                        startAnimation(1979);

Add -

                        castOnPlayer.uberentangle();

If you have any errors search for this -

    /* PKING VOIDS

and under that add -

public void uberentangle() { EntangleDelay = 40; }

If you still get errors then search for -

    public int LogoutDelay = 0;

And under that add -

    public int EntangleDelay = 0;

Then search for -

if (LogoutDelay > 0) { LogoutDelay -= 1; }

And under that add -

if (EntangleDelay > 0) { EntangleDelay -= 1; }

You should only have to do the first thing.

Read full topic
